column5: Being such a gorgeous bluebird day today it was a perfect opportunity to bring the kids to a local trout pond to help hone their skills.  Couldn't have gone any better. I fished a variety of flies under their floats with a small beadhead caddis being by far the most successful.  After working somewhat hard to entice the fish with flies we switched to ye olde garden hackle to put some meat in the cooler.  Still hard to beat a worm.  Please forgive the amateurish videos.  Still, they do tell a story.  <iframe title="YouTube video player" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/DwG_m9Fjppc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>   <iframe title="YouTube video player" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/7UnuEKodFk8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>          My daughter caught fish as well, but refused to touch them LOL!  Great day all around,  Cheers,  Mike
So this is where you catch all you fish, eh Mike?
That's a nice size stockeye.  Looks like a great day to take the kids out for some real education.
Great job! Looks like a blast!
That was awesome Mike. Me thinks Zoey would be a better netter.  Thanks for sharing.  Cant wait for the warmer temps and open water to get the grandkids out.
Training grounds!  Looks like the kids had a blast Mike.
What pretty spot. An' thats what it's all about kids had fun from the sounds of the video
You are a lucky man Mike.Those kids are great.  And they are lucky to have you as thier teacher.No doubt that someday they will be great anglers, to follow ih Dads boots.
Looks like a fun day Mike, I think your boy has already caught more trout than me!!!

I still remember being introduced to fishing at a trout pond. Seems a long time ago now, but definitely started in getting me hooked on fishing. Always good to see the next generation of fishers learning the ropes.
I know that place! Looks like a great time was had by all. Need something like that closer to me....

Awesome bud!  I love the reports with the little ones!  You'll have some guaranteed partners for years to come man... I love the easy location to... I dragged the kids way back in the bush today for a skunkin'  Enjoy them man!  Cheers, Ryan
Your boy fights fish like a pro Mike...good stuff
gotta love the excitement in their voice! I don't have any kids yet but im sure its all worth it!
thats what its all about man ....Nice Job!!!
Thanks guys. My son told me this morning he wants to go back today.  Maybe I'll bring a fly rod this time.
I was going to ask when he'd be getting his first pin! ;o)
Beauty day for dad and kids, just my speed too.....LOL
Good stuff Mike.  I cant wait until my daughter is old enough....this is what it is all about.
Talk about great memories! Way to go! "somebody help me please!"...that's the way I feel most days too! LOL Nice looking ponds. I bet the ice is only off for a day or so too?
looks like a great day with the kids

He's already got a float rod and reel.   Still a bit too young to handle it yet though.    Yeah it was pretty funny. He was so excited I thought he'd pee his pants.  Ice has been out for about 3 weeks now I think.
Nice!! Looks like a GREAT Day!

Great stuff, Mike!  Love the videos, and, the excitement in the little ones voices! Little stocked trout ponds are where my mom and dad got me hooked on fishing many years ago...most of those places don't stock anymore, but, at least there are opportunities such as this for today's youngsters
